newsitem.title: POLAND: Polish shares close lower in continuous trade.
newsitem.headline: Polish shares close lower in continuous trade.

text.p: Seven stocks fell, four rose and nine were flat in 5.6-million-zloty Warsaw bourse continuous trade on Monday with the WIG 20 index down 0.2 percent to 1,451.3 points.
The remaining 10 stocks did not trade.
NFI units fell 0.4 percent to 118.5 zlotys in a 2.3-million-zloty turnover.
The National Investment Fund NFI index fell 0.8 percent to 120.9 points in 0.7-million-zloty trade.
